title: Regular season average attendance of the Milwaukee Brewers 2009 to 2019
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Average attendance. In total the number of data points it has is 11.
In general Average attendance has stayed the same over the Year.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2012 and 2013.
Maximum Average attendance, about 37918.0 was reported at Year 2011
Minimum Average attendance about 28575.0 was reached at Year 2016
min_summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average attendance, containing a total of 11 data points.
Overall Average attendance has decreased over the Year.

Average attendance is slightly increasing from 2009 to 2010, roughly decreasing from 2010 to 2012, slightly increasing from 2012 to 2013, roughly decreasing from 2013 to 2015, gradually increasing from 2015 to 2018, and finally roughly constant from 2018 to 2019.
